001package Calibration_Demos_More;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.ImageStack;
006import ij.io.LogStream;
007import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
008import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
009import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.ZhangData;
010import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
011import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.InterCameraMapping;
012import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMapper;
013import imagingbook.lib.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
014import imagingbook.lib.settings.PrintPrecision;
015import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
017
018
019/**
020 * This plugin opens an image stack containing the 5 Zhang
021 * test images (assumed to be taken with camera A) and re-renders 
022 * the images by mapping them to a new camera B. In this example,
023 * only the lens distortion coefficients are modified but in
024 * principle all intrinsic parameters of camera B could be changed.
025 * 
026 * @author W. Burger
027 * @version 2021-08-22
028 */
029public class Demo_Replace_Camera implements PlugIn {
030
031        static Class<?> resourceRootClass = ZhangData.class;
032        static String resourceDir = "resources/";
033        static String resourceName = "CalibImageStack.tif";
034
035        // modified lens distortion coefficients:
036        static double k1 = -0.1;
037        static double k2 =  2.0;
038
039        static boolean BeVerbose = false;
040
041        //static final String TestImgName = "CalibImageStack.tif";
042        static {
043                LogStream.redirectSystem();
044                PrintPrecision.set(6);
045        }
046
047        public void run(String arg0) {
048                // open the test image (stack): 
049                ResourceLocation loc = new imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.DATA.RLOC();
050                ImagePlus testIm = loc.getResource(resourceName).openAsImage();
051
052                if (testIm == null) {
053                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!");
054                        return;
055                }
056                testIm.show();
057                String title = testIm.getShortTitle();
058
059                // get the camera intrinsics (typically by calibration):
060                Camera cameraA = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
061
062                double[] paramsA = cameraA.getParameterVector();
063                paramsA[5] = k1;
064                paramsA[6] = k2;
065
066                Camera cameraB = new Camera(paramsA);
067
068                // create a special geometric mapping
069                Mapping2D mapping = new InterCameraMapping(cameraA, cameraB);   // inverse, maps target to source
070
071                // rectify the images and create a new stack:
072                ImageStack distStack = testIm.getStack();
073                final int w = distStack.getWidth();
074                final int h = distStack.getHeight();
075                final int M = distStack.getSize();
076
077                ImageStack rectStack = new ImageStack(w, h);
078                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
079                        IJ.showProgress(i, M);
080                        ImageProcessor source = distStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
081                        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
082                        ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(mapping, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
083                        mapper.map(source, target);
084//                      mapping.applyTo(source, target, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
085                        rectStack.addSlice("frame"+ (i + 1), target);
086                }
087
088                new ImagePlus(title+"-modfied", rectStack).show();
089        }
090
091}
